attributes.action: act now to remove golden handshakes/pensions from MPs forced to resign.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is obscene that MPs, including Cabinet Ministers, who are pressured to resign by constituents, should remain eligible for golden handshakes and huge pensions at the taxpayers' cost; and they should be forced to go now, rather than allowed to remain in office until the next general election, drawing considerable further extra earnings at the taxpayers' expense.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
